form.label: Data Model Acceleration Sourcetypes
form.description: Shows the sourcetypes found in the data model acceleration data. If there is no data model acceleration enabled this will not return results.

table.title: Sourcetypes By Data Model
table.searchString: | rest /services/datamodel/model | search NOT acceleration=*false* | dedup displayName | fields acceleration displayName title | map search="| tstats summariesonly=true values(sourcetype) AS Sourcetypes from datamodel=$$title$$ | eval DataModel=\"$$displayName$$\"" maxsearches=20 | fields DataModel Sourcetypes
